snippet.title: Devlog: Interview with Modulus' Game Director David
snippet.description:
WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2779120/Modulus/
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/QbTr9bFqTF

In this devlog, we sit down with Modulus' Game Director David to talk shop. You get exclusive behind-the-scenes access, showcasing how Modulus is made from concept to release. Stay tuned for more episodes, where we'll delve into various aspects of game development, introduce you to different team members, and explore the intricate details that make Modulus unique.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Chapters
00:00 Introduction
00:14 Where did the idea for Modulus come from?
00:42 What is the main objective in Modulus?
02:49 How does Modulus challenge players over time?
05:11 What aspect of Modulus are you most proud of?
06:02 What are your plans for Modulus?
07:45 Where can people learn more about the game?
